title: Songs by Dead Girls
description: 'Bernard wrenched open the door and ran back out to Carole, horrified to see her face was pouring with blood.'A deadly Virus. A missing academic with a head full of secrets that could embarrass the government. A prostitute on the run. And a music-loving drug baron who needs a favour.All in a dayâ€™s work for the North Edinburgh Health Enforcement Team.
